comments.author: Steve
comments.body:
Koster!

Sorry to hear I passed on my cold. iSean will take this as further evidence of my perfidy. Oh well.

The ice can be beautiful, indeed! I remember driving the Kanc once after an ice storm, and it was spectacular. You can't help but feel sad for all the trees, though. Hey, it's New Hampshire...the trees will be back in 10 years!

comments.author: ktbikes
comments.body: Yeah, no kidding. Power and phone came back after 10hr yesterday...but took a 2hr break overnight. I'm sure this is a faux pas and oh the poor trees that are still standing are all keeled over but it's really beautiful out there. S&A, thanks for sharing the plague!
